title: UK further restricts Microsoft and Activision merge
description: The UK competition regulator bans Microsoft and Activision from "acquiring an interest" in each other.

title: Indians urged to report growing WhatsApp spam calls
description: Many users have been complaining about receiving calls from unknown international numbers.

title: Disney+ streaming business loses 4m subscribers in first quarter
description: Most of the losses came from its Hotstar service in Asia, which has lost rights to Indian cricket matches.
